Chinese.Description: 生成发光的能量盾，照亮周围较大面积区域，进入盾内的生物会降低一定移速，并持续受到伤害。按下你设置的按键以开启和关闭护盾。

English.Description: Generate a glowing energy shield that illuminates a larger area around it. Creatures entering the shield will slow down their movement and continue to suffer damage. Press the button you set to turn on and off the shield.
